title: Tagliata of Beef with Rocket, Parmesan & Balsamic — Foodie Fuel
method: Preheat oven to 200°C (fan 180°C).
Season the beef sirloin steak with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a heavy pan over medium-high heat.
Sear the beef sirloin steak until golden: fish 2 minutes per side, meat 3–4 minutes per side.
Transfer to the oven and cook until just done: fish 6–10 minutes, chicken or pork 15–20 minutes, beef or lamb 18–22 minutes.
Warm the beans and vegetables gently with garlic and herbs.
Rest the meat or fish for 3–5 minutes.
Finish with lemon juice and fresh herbs.
plating: Spoon beans and vegetables onto warm plates, slice and arrange the cooked meat or fish on top, finish with olive oil and herbs.
swaps: Swap for a comparable Italian cut if unavailable.
optional_finishes: Capers, anchovy oil or aged balsamic.

diabetesUK.notes: Diabetes-friendly tagging aligned with Diabetes UK style guidance when portioned as specified.

notes: Uses olive, coconut, or avocado oil only. No seed oils.
